data.name: Farming Simulator 22 - Year 1 Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Includes:
- Zetor 25 K
- ANTONIO CARRARO Pack
- KUBOTA Pack
- Vermeer Pack
- FIRST EXPANSION: A new map and a plethora of machines await you!
data.about_the_game:
Includes:
- Zetor 25 K
- ANTONIO CARRARO Pack
- KUBOTA Pack
- Vermeer Pack
- FIRST EXPANSION: A new map and a plethora of machines await you!
data.short_description: YEAR 1 Season Pass is now available!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Norwegian, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that avoid or influence the functionality in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 570 or better (min 6GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that avoid or influence the functionality in some cases.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM, DX11/DX12 support)
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that avoid or influence the functionality in some cases.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 570 or better (min 6GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: TbA
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
